showChatMessageIcon.label: Message Icon
showChatMessageIcon.hint: Displays the icon on chat messages that got changed by the karma.

controlsButton.label: Config Button
controlsButton.hint: Adds a button on the Controls bar to open the Karma Configuration. You can also open the configuration by setting a keybinding.

hideModule.label: Hide Module from Players
hideModule.hint: Replaces the module's name in the Module Management menu for non-GMs to "libDiceStats".

UserPicker.title: Who should be affected by karma?

Faces.label: Faces
Faces.hint: The number of faces of the die.

Inequality.label: Inequality
Inequality.hint: Sets when the Karma should be triggered, based on the given inequality.

hint.average: If the average of the last {number} rolls is...

Nudge.label: Adjustment
Nudge.hint: ...the next die roll and each subsequent roll will be adjusted by {number}, until the average is {term} {threshold}.

Cumulative.label: Is Cumulative
Cumulative.hint: The adjusment will accumulate on subsequent rolls.
